summary: This mod will replace the lackluster model of Red Eagle\'s Bane with something a bit more flashy.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dv93l.png[/IMG][/center]

Description
===========
This mod will replace the common model of Red Eagle\'s Bane with a customized model.
It\'s a unique weapon, now it actually looks like one!

Like this weapon?
Check out my Nord hero sword replacer/non-replacer!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20929

Feature!
====================
By Brodual:
[youtube]QVdPFwd-k90[/youtube]

By Hodilton:
[youtube]GvhQkTXtrLQ[/youtube]

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
none reported yet.

History
=======
v1 - initial release
v1.1 - Small tweak to the textures. (glowing part at the origin of the flames)
V1.2 - Added Standalone Red version
(Note: Only use the blue OR the red. using both will overwrite the previous install. Same goes for the optional High res patches!)

Contact
=======
Right here on the Nexus.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the CK.
Thanks to The Nexus.com for the great service they provide.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Blender - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=12248
GIMP - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=14920
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
The contents of this mod can be used on the sole condition that the authors permission to use the assets of this mod has been obtained and the author is duly credited for his work.
A link to the mod using these assets would be welcome as well =)

Related
===============
Looking for a fancy weapon to include in your new mod?
Look no further! Check out my
[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"][url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12087\"][img]http://i.imgur.com/w43aI.png[/img][/url][/color][/size]
No permission needed, models and textures included in every download!
